<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>x_cdltd_loaner_req_loaner_request_script_2</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[if (current.item_type =="cmdb_ci_computer") {
    var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
request.setEndpoint('https://nowlearning-nlinst01798182-0001.lab.service-now.com/api/now/table/u_password_vault?sysparm_query=u_asset%3D' +current.cmdb_ci.asset_tag +  '&sysparm_fields=u_password&sysparm_limit=1');
request.setHttpMethod('GET');
//Eg. UserName="admin", Password="admin" for this code sample.
var user = 'admin';
var password = '69sCHTVCXbav';
request.setBasicAuth(user,password);
request.setRequestHeader("Accept","application/json");
var response = request.execute();
var obj = JSON.parse(response.getBody());
var myPass = obj.result[0].u_password;
template.print('u_password: ' + myPass);
  }]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-15 17:29:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>69c40e359fb202107f4467973524abd8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_cdltd_loaner_req_loaner_request_script_2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_cdltd_loaner_req">e48e3dd6012202107f445049aa530f3d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">e48e3dd6012202107f445049aa530f3d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_69c40e359fb202107f4467973524abd8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-15 17:29:49</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>
